links.label: Black Flame Of The Amazon Pin - 1930s
Black Flame Of The Amazon CD Cover

links.url: /Library Files/B Series/Black Flame Of The Amazon, The/
links.label: Library Files

infos.info: WJW will launch a new series next Monday [14 February] entitled 'The Black Flame of the Amazon' an educational story with no 'terror' in it Ã¢ÂÂ¦ The serial will run from Monday through Friday each week, and is designed to interest both children and adults. - Local Notes - The Akron Beacon Journal (Akron, Ohio) - Wed. 2/9/1938. p.9~The WJW feature 'The Black Flame of the Amazon' moves to 7 p.m. spot tomorrow [Wednesday March 30] and will be heard at this hour henceforth. - The Akron Beacon Journal (Akron, Ohio) - Tue 3/29/1938 - p. 19~Last listing of the show in Ohio. - The Sandusky Register (Sandusky, Ohio) - Fri 5/27/1938 - p.14~Appears in Detroit newspaper in August 1938~First appearance in Australia - 3KZ 7:30 'Black Flame of the Amazon' - The Age (Melbourne, Victoria, Australia) - Fri 9/23/1938 - p. 21
